title: Ticket #5923: JobStartDate is set inconsistently.
description:
We found that CMS has some code that depends on the fact that JobStartDate is always set when the job is in JobStatus==2.

This seems to usually be a safe assumption. However, it seems there are some code paths (haven't figured them out) where JobStatus is set in one transaction, then JobStartDate is set in a following transaction.

That means there are some cases where the job is running but JobStartDate is unset. In CMS, this triggers the issue described in #5921.

We should figure out what the alternate code path is here and make sure that JobStartDate is set consistently.
creator: bbockelm
